name: ITP - C3001 - Mangaturanga Bridge Repair - Bridge Deck Repair
template name: ITP - C3001 - Mangaturanga Bridge Repair - Bridge Deck Repair

name: Detail - Dimensions of concrete breakout on bridge deck must be agreed with the CPS Engineer
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Visual Inspection
Conformance Criteria - Dimensions at top deck and deck soffit agreed upon
Detail - Contractor must provide a list of all proposed repair construction materials with any technical data sheets available for each material for CPS Engineer approval.
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Submission
Conformance Criteria - List of all materials and technical data sheets
Detail - CPS Engineer to inspect the areas broken out to inspect surface edge preparation
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Visual Inspection
Conformance Criteria - 45° taper cut on all 4 edges, no damage to existing reinforcement and shear cleat.
Detail - Exposed and accessible (top and bottom) reinforcing steel must be power tool cleaned to SSPC SP3 standard. Other areas cleaned to SSPC SP2 standard.
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Visual Inspection
Conformance Criteria - SSPC SP3 and SP2 standard.
Detail - HD10 longitudinal bars to comply to design
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Visual Inspection
Conformance Criteria - Ensure all new and existing reinforcement bars are coated with a cement-based polymer modified coating material containing silica fume. Ensure all surfaces are fully coated
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Visual Inspection
Conformance Criteria - HD10 hooked straight bars, crs 150mm, to form closed loop with hooked bent bar, embedded minimum 150mm, distance between 45° breakout face to be between 20-30mm
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Visual Inspection
Conformance Criteria - HD10 hooked bent bars, crs 150mm, to form closed loop with hooked straight bar, embedded minimum 150mm with chemset, distance between 45° breakout face to be between 20-30mm
Detail - CPS Engineer to inspect placement of reinforcing steel after it is fixed in position
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Visual Inspection
Conformance Criteria - Hooked bars tied with 2mm wire as per construction drawings
Records - CS-4040 Concrete Insecption Record & Photos
Detail - CPS Engineer to inspect formwork before casting
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Visual Inspection

Conformance Criteria - Forms must have sufficient rigidity and strength to prevent distortion due to pressure from the concrete. Formwork to remain in place until concrete reaches a compressive strength of 30MPa
Records - CS-4040 Concrete Insecption Record & Photos
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Visual Inspection
Conformance Criteria - Ensure exposed concrete edges are free from dust and loose particles
Detail - Site Engineer to witness casting of concrete deck repair
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Visual Inspection
Conformance Criteria - All concrete used in deck repair must be in compliance with T-CES 101. Surface finish in accordance with NZS 3114. Deck top surface - U3. Exposed soffit of deck - F5.
Detail - Contractor to provide minimum of 9 concrete cubes for laboratory material compressive testing
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Lab Testing
Conformance Criteria - Minimum compressive strength of:
○ Patchroc C (Fosroc) or equivalent should be used.
○ All concrete supplied shall comply with NZS 3109
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Submission
Conformance Criteria - Contractor to provide details of the proposed measures intended to protect the concrete during curing
Detail - Prior to resurfacing, CPS Engineer to inspect the newly cast deck repair and make the decision whether crack injection is required
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Visual Inspection
Conformance Criteria - Crack injection required if crack between newly cast concrete and existing deck exceeds 0.3mm
Detail - Road surfacing reinstated to be consistent with rest of deck surfacing (Grade 3/5 racked in Chipseal). Contractor to provide methodology for resurfacing
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Submission
Detail - Upon completion of works, Site Engineer to inspect works to confirm it is completed to required standard for sign off
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Visual Inspection
Conformance Criteria - Signatures from Site and CPS Engineers
Detail - Red line mark up drawings to be reviewed and accepted. All NCRs and RFIs are closed and included with Handover QA file.
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Document Review
Conformance Criteria - Ensure all QA is uploaded into ConQA / Procore
18 - Completion Sign Off From Fields Below
